attributes.title: Freezes
attributes.review: Every time I open this app my phone would freeze every time every 5 minutes. My other apps don’t have these problems. I would delete it multiple times or reset my phone but it would still freeze. -UNUSUAL.

attributes.title: horrendous🧚‍♀️🧚🧚‍♂️
attributes.review: this is the absolute worst app ever and i am so upset with apple for having this on their app store. it’s a shame that i will not be buying another apple product again until this app is removed. i have friends and family supporting me on this movement. trump is despicable, or shall i say “bad” because he and his supporters probably do not understand words that are longer than three syllables. rip trump, so sad to see that they are still running this pathetic app even after his death.

attributes.title: Broccoli is better than this app
attributes.review: I got this app really hoping that somehow it would prove to me that our president is not a racist, incompetent, sexist, lying, selfish, greedy, cheating man but sadly I was mistaken. :/ Would not recommended even THINKING about getting this app if you want to keep any sanity you have left.

attributes.title: This is disappointing
attributes.review: I got the app to widen my view political views. What I saw is a disappointment to mankind, take better pictures. I wish I can say one good thing about this but that would be impossible. If you want to better this start with basic human rights.

attributes.title: Keeping in touch with President Trump
attributes.review: I love the app that keeps us up to date on all I

attributes.title: THERE WERE GHOSTS
attributes.review: I was just trying to download the app, but when i did, i started seeing things. The app enables ghosts and zombies to enter your home. They possessed and ate both the family cats. They almost got my sister too, all while screaming “TrUmP 2o2o” they didn’t give my eardrums a break. Still traumatized. ❤️

attributes.title: bad orange man😡🍑
attributes.review:
i downloaded the app thinking i would get free cheetos they never arrived worst app ever this random man came to my home he had a weave it look like it was about to fly away he was orange and ugly if you don’t want a orange man appearing at your home DONT download the app😌
     i only did this for tiktok follow @_.van3ssaaa._
   that’s my tiktok😌

attributes.title: inadequate
attributes.review: inadequate. as soon as i opened it i was immediately taken back in time against my will to a time where women are treated like sex objects and black people are lynched on the daily and innocent lgbtqia murdered for no reason. not what i was looking for when i downloaded the app, which is why i have to rate it one star. i also think this app causes dangerous health risk,  as i did have 2020 vision but now everything is really orange and i might have to get glasses. so i really don’t recommend this app; incompetent and inadequate.

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: If i could give it zero i would☹️ all i saw was pictures of Cheetos and crackers 🥺 i wanted to see this great person all those people with 1.0 GPA loved but only found a weird thing with a pile of hay on their head 😭I’m so disappointed how could they trick me like that!

attributes.title: NEVER AGAIN!😢
attributes.review: I really HATE THIS APP. It killed my fishes. When I opened the app.🥱It was fun and games until I showed my fishes the picture of the front screen. IT IS WAYY TOO LOUD UP IN HERE that my fishes have to suffer from orange pres disease. IT WAS ON PURPOSE! you guys were killing my pets! please do not download this app as it will kill your pets and family members. ❌❌DO NOT DOWNLOAD❌❌
